subject: moderator
msgSnippet: Due to the problems we were beginning to have with spam a short time ago, our site does not now permit new members to post until they have been approved by the
messageBody:
Due to the problems we were beginning to have with spam a short time
ago, our site does not now permit new members to post until they have
been approved by the owner. Since I sometimes don't check my e-mail
every day, this means a post might go unapproved for some period of
time.

If there is someone in the group who would be willing to serve as a
moderator to insure that new posts are legitimate and not the
ever-lurking spambots just waiting for us to let our guard down,
please let me know. Adding another moderator should shorten the
approval time for new members to post without being moderated. My
practice has been to approve all new members as soon as they submit a
post that is obviously on point and not an ad for septic tank
cleaners, viagra or worse.

Thanks.

Paige Gabhart

Due to the problems we were beginning to have with spam a short time
ago, our site does not now permit new members to post until they have
been approved by the owner.  Since I sometimes don't check my e-mail
every day, this means a post might go unapproved for some period of
time.  

If there is someone in the group who would be willing to serve as a
moderator to insure that new posts are legitimate and not the
ever-lurking spambots just waiting for us to let our guard down,
please let me know.  Adding another moderator should shorten the
approval time for new members to post without being moderated.  My
practice has been to approve all new members as soon as they submit a
post that is obviously on point and not an ad for septic tank
cleaners, viagra or worse.

Thanks.

Paige Gabhart
